<title level="1" right="Action">[Darting Attack](/Actions.aspx?ID=2280) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 209 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

The raptor Steps up to 10 feet and then Strikes, or Strikes and then Steps up to 10 feet.
name: Darting Attack
